resources.string: Please grant all required permissions to use GNUXON as a body camera

GNUXON is Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) maintained by RedHead Industries (RIIDF Branch). By using this app, you agree to use it responsibly and in compliance with local laws. Record only where you have legal authority to do so.
Background video recording for body camera functionality
Body camera is recording in background

GNUXON requires camera access for body camera functionality to record video in the background for law enforcement, journalism, and security purposes. This enables continuous recording even when the device is locked or the app is in the background.

GNUXON requires microphone access to record audio along with video for complete body camera functionality used by police officers, journalists, and security personnel. Audio recording provides crucial context for video evidence.
